headline: STE Q1 Earnings Call: STERIS Outpaces Profit Expectations, Faces Revenue Headwinds and Tariff Uncertainty
summary: Medical equipment and services company Steris (NYSE:STE). missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025 as sales rose 4.3% year on year to $1.48 billion. Its non-GAAP EPS of $2.74 per share was 5.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
